item.title: Vscode
item.description: Common Shortcuts to find files and functions Cntl - P : Find file by filename; also supports wildcards Cntrl - Shift - P : Open the action menu Common Editor short cuts Cntrl - Alt - Arrows : Select multiple lines for edit together
item.content:encoded: Common Shortcuts to find files and functions Cntl - P : Find file by filename; also supports wildcards Cntrl - Shift - P : Open the action menu Common Editor short cuts Cntrl - Alt - Arrows : Select multiple lines for edit together
